titleStmt.title: A letter of examination to all who have assumed the place of shepherds, herdsmen, and overseers of the flocks of people of all sorts in Christendom : to see if your accounts be ready and what order the flocks be in : with a few lines of good news to the several flocks.
titleStmt.author: Edmundson, William, 1627-1712.

titleStmt.title: A letter of examination to all who have assumed the place of shepherds, herdsmen, and overseers of the flocks of people of all sorts in Christendom : to see if your accounts be ready and what order the flocks be in : with a few lines of good news to the several flocks.
titleStmt.author: Edmundson, William, 1627-1712.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated: William Edmondson, Jamaica, the 24th of the 12th month 1671.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
